# 区间选点

[AcWing-905-区间选点](https://www.acwing.com/solution/content/3047/)

## 分析

最少覆盖区间点数`=`最多不相交区间数

## 实现

```cpp
#include <iostream>
#include <algorithm>
#define inf 0x3f3f3f3f
using namespace std;
const int N = 100010;
struct element
{
    int l, r;
    bool operator < (const element &o) const
    {
        return r < o.r;
    }
};
element a[N];

int main()
{
    int n;
    scanf("%d", &n);
    for(int i = 1; i <= n; ++ i) scanf("%d%d", &a[i].l, &a[i].r);
    sort(a + 1, a + n + 1);
    int res = 0, cur_r = -inf;
    for(int i = 1; i <= n; ++ i)
    {
        if(cur_r < a[i].l)
        {
            ++ res;
            cur_r = a[i].r;
        }
    }
    printf("%d\n", res);
    return 0;
}
```
